message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I've already invested a lot in this product and I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need $11,000 to make it worth my while.
